doc:
Charles Edward Pogue https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Edward_Pogue 0 Charles Edward Pogue Jr. (born January 18, 1950) is an American screenwriter, playwright and stage actor. He is best known for writing the screenplays of The Hound of the Baskervilles (1983), Psycho III (1986), The Fly (1986) and Dragonheart (1996). Charles_Edward_Pogue_Jr. ( born January_18_,_1950 ) is an_American_screenwriter_,_playwright_and_stage_actor . He is_best_known for writing the_screenplays of The_Hound of the_Baskervilles ( 1983 ) , Psycho_III_(_1986_) , The Fly (_1986_)_and_Dragonheart_(_1996_) .
